data.text: A Mirror for Drop Bars
Looking for recommendations for a mirror to use on drop bars. Have tried a few and still not finding one that works well for me
I have one that mounts to the side of my glasses. Works great for me
data.author: Billy Dickman

data.text: Mirrycle. They say it's for flat bars, but it works very well on drop bars too. Slightly convex glass gives a really clear field of view. I have them on all of my bikes.

data.text: I guess it’s all about preference but I prefer helmet mirrors because I can alter the angle and eliminate blind spots. Bar mounted mirrors always have more limits.

data.text: I have a cheap one like this. I prefer one that’s mounted onto the flat part of the drop bar instead of inserted into the end, my arm blocks the view of those. There’s a learning curve and the biggest tip is to train your eye focus “thru” the mirror and down the road of the view if that makes sense.
